mapper.select: SELECT product_id, name, description, created_by_id, created_by_date, last_update_by_id, last_update_by_date FROM product
SELECT product_id, name, description, created_by_id, created_by_date, last_update_by_id, last_update_by_date FROM product WHERE product_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (name, description, created_by_id, created_by_date, last_update_by_id, last_update_by_date) VALUES ({#name}, {#description}, {#createdById}, {#createdByDate}, {#createdById}, {#createdByDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET name = {#product.name}, description = {#product.description}, last_update_by_id = {#product.lastUpdateById}, last_update_by_date = {#product.lastUpdateByDate} WHERE product_id = {#product.id}
